Name: Malice & Greed
About the game: Malice & Greed is a roguelike turn-based RPG inspired by Shin Megami Tensei & Persona , combined with elements of deckbuilders like Slay the Spire . Force every enemy & boss to join your team, and battle your way to Nirvana, swapping allies in & out during combat as you please! After battle, the final defeated enemy joins you ! Will you risk saving the strongest for last? Butcher enemies to steal their skills for yourself, and create the ultimate build! Mix & match skills of 4 Colors to explore new playstyles each run. You gain power each turn letting you use stronger skills as the fight goes on - but so does the enemy! Sell unwanted allies to the Shady Smuggler to get powerful relics and upgrades! Build broken combos by abusing the synergies of skills & systems! Sacrifice allies to defy death using Demonform ! Something New Every Run! Use over 500 skills and 80 relics that make each run unique. Trade your 'Allies' - Your party members are your currency. Unlock & Customize 3 powerful Demonic transformations. Force over 20 bosses and 70 enemies to join your team - Each with 5 different versions to choose from. Spend your resources between runs to unlock new features & upgrades. /
